Class Date

java.lang.Object
RUClinic.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
The Date class is used to hold a date with the variables: year, month, and day. This class provides an easier way to not only return a date but also to keep track and validate the date of certain appointments in the clinic.

      public int getDay()
      Helper Method to get the day of the date of a certain appointment
      Returns:
      day of the Appointment as an int

    • isTodayOrBefore

      public boolean isTodayOrBefore()
      One of the methods to check if a date is valid If the date is today or a date before today, it is invalid
      Returns:
      true if the date is not today or a day before today and false if not

    • isInSixMonths

      public boolean isInSixMonths()
      One of the methods to check if a date is valid If the date is more than 6 months ahead of today, then it is invalid
      Returns:
      true if the date is not more than 6 months ahead of today and false if not

    • isWeekend

      public boolean isWeekend()
      One of the methods to check if a date is valid If the date is a weekend, then it is invalid
      Returns:
      true if the date is not a weekend and false if not

    • isDateValid

      public boolean isDateValid()
      One of the methods to check if a date is valid The date is invalid if it does not exist
      Returns:
      boolean value that shows true if it exists and false if not

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Method to see if a certain date is valid for an appointment The date is invalid if it does not pass all invalid checkers
      Returns:
      boolean value that shows true if it's a valid date and false if it's not

    • daysInMonth

      public int daysInMonth(int year, int month)
      A method to figure out how many days are in a given month, including leap years
      Parameters:
      year - needs to be checked if it is a leap year
      month - needs to see which month is being referred to
      Returns:
      the amount of days in a given month as an int

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date otherDate)
      Method to compare a certain date with another one to see if one is later than the other
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      otherDate - date to compare to the first Date
      Returns:
      -1 if the original/first Date is earlier than otherDate, 1 if the opposite, or 0 if both dates are the same

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object date)
      Method to compare a certain date with another one to see if they are equal
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      date - object to compare to the first Date
      Returns:
      true if the specified object is a Date and represents the same year, month, and day. If not, then false.
